title: Zelda, but if I say "bear" then 20 bears spawn
author: PointCrow
description:
I've had Breath of the Wild modded so that whenever I say a particular voice command, that thing will spawn inside the game. Whether its a guardian, ganon, or 20 bears, can i beat Zelda with my chat trying to stop me?

Thank you to Greenlord and SDarkMagic for creating the mod, and @DougDoug  for help with setup + inspiration
Greenlord: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNarQvqa5KWE1vtswQzYDtw
SDarkMagic: https://www.twitch.tv/sdarkmagic
